mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Connect national and international travelers to Brazil's immense cultural and natural wealth, promoting sustainable tourism and appreciation of our heritage.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the ultimate travel companion for those who wish to explore authentic Brazil, facilitating access to information about cultural and natural heritage throughout the country.

story.title: Our Story
story.text: Ataîru was born from a passion for revealing the beauties and traditions of Brazil that often go unnoticed. Our name is a tribute to the indigenous roots of the country.
story.origin: The word 'Ataîru' comes from Tupi-Guarani and means 'travel companion'. We chose this name because we believe discovering Brazil is a journey best made with company — through stories, culture, and people who share the same love for our country.
story.purpose: Our platform was created to connect travelers with the essence of Brazil: its cultural and natural heritage, its living traditions, and its incomparable biodiversity. We want to be the bridge between you and authentic experiences that transform trips into unforgettable memories.

heritage.title: Understanding Heritage
heritage.world: UNESCO World Heritage - Sites of outstanding universal value internationally recognized.
heritage.material: Tangible Heritage - Physical assets representing historical and architectural landmarks.
heritage.intangible: Intangible Heritage - Traditions, knowledge, and cultural expressions passed down through generations.
heritage.natural: Natural Heritage - Protected areas preserving unique ecosystems and biodiversity.
